Segment.name: N8
Segment.comment: To identify the waybill and to specify the equipment used and the destination details

Field.name: WaybillNumber1
Field.comment: Carrier accounting number of the waybill for the inbound movement

Field.name: Date1
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: CrossReferenceTypeCode
Field.comment: Code defining relationship of equipment to equipment cross-referenced

Field.name: EquipmentInitial
Field.comment: Prefix or alphabetic part of an equipment unit's identifying number

Field.name: EquipmentNumber
Field.comment: Sequencing or serial part of an equipment unit's identifying number (pure numeric form for equipment number is preferred)

Field.name: WaybillNumber2
Field.comment: Carrier accounting number of the waybill for the inbound movement

Field.name: Date2
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: StateOrProvinceCode
Field.comment: Code (Standard State/Province) as defined by appropriate government agency

Field.name: FreightStationAccountingCode
Field.comment: Code (Freight Station Accounting) (AAR Managed Code for Locations)
